Class ShowScreeningsViewController

java.lang.Object
com.example.theaterproject.Controllers.ShowScreeningsViewController
public class ShowScreeningsViewController extends Object
Controller responsible for managing the show screenings view. Displays all available screenings for a selected movie in a list view.

  • Field Summary

  • Field Details

    • aMovieTitleLabel

      private javafx.scene.control.Label aMovieTitleLabel
      Label that displays the title of the movie being shown.

    • aScreeningsListView

      private javafx.scene.control.ListView<Screening> aScreeningsListView
      ListView that displays all available screenings for the movie. Each item shows the date and time of the screening.

    • onBackButtonClick
